channel.title: 8.0 on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 8.0 on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.5 Is Available
item.description: The fifth patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download! This release contains a few security fixes, so we highly recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.4 is available
item.description: The fourth patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download! This release contains a few security fixes, so we recommend you to upgrade your shop as soon as possible.

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.3 is available
item.description: The third patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.2 is available
item.description: The second patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0.1 is available
item.description: The first patch version for PrestaShop 8 is now available to download!

item.title: PrestaShop 8.0 Is Available
item.description: The maintainers team is pleased to announce that PrestaShop 8.0 is officially available.

item.title: PrestaShop Version 8.0 Feature Freeze: Important Features
PrestaShop beyond 1.7
item.description: Five years ago, PrestaShop 1.7 was released to the world, introducing Symfony, the Classic theme and child theme features, interface improvements, and so much more. With each one of the eight minor versions that followed, 1.7 kept on growing both in features and stability. Its maturity is recognized by its success: with over 170,000 live shops detected at the time of writing, itâ€™s the most popular PrestaShop version used in production shops on the web.
